replies.body: Yeah.  Lame but not as bad as the "5man trolling premade" missions.

And there's me using my PROJECT: Poro.

> [{quoted}](name=Alex h8721,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kkPkwKha,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-24T20:47:23.865+0000)
>
> Yeah.  Lame but not as bad as the "5man trolling premade" missions.

I fail to see how it's trolling if there's not actually any target/victim. The meta-challenging missions have actually been some of my favourite - it's fun figuring out how to win, again. The first week of runes was likewise enjoyable - it was nice playing a game and deciding "nope, that was a shit idea". They require a premade-5 so that everyone on the team has to agree to complete the mission - i.e. removes any possible abuse. 

The only issues with previous implementations of premade missions is

* Lack of public chat room to build teams in.
* Rewards requiring the completion of all missions to earn enough currency. 

But Riot's already addressed the second point and said they're working on the first. Since the Star Guardian event, there's never really been a need to earn all possible currency. Star Guardian literally had 2 rewards and one of them was junk - so you didn't have to do everything, you could do half. And all others since have have superfluous currency too. If you don't have friends or don't enjoy getting creative - just don't do the mission.
Because idiots were trying it with randoms thinking "DURR IF I TELL EVERY1 TO TAKE TP IT COUNTS" but it didn't

5 man premade missions shouldnt go away they just have different end prizes for 5 man and solo and not let them cross paths. that way they can promote their play with friends and have them join policy but dont have the big big prize locked behind it away from solo que players
All this forced icon stuff is annoying.
We don't have to use the icon this time do we?
You can use any project icon, not just the one provided.

> [{quoted}](name=Mokuto Bunshi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kkPkwKha,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-24T21:08:36.733+0000)
>
> We don't have to use the icon this time do we?

Thankfully not.
We just appreciate the hard work and uniqueness this icon provides us.
lol at the people who can't see the invisible "/s" here.
Yes, you do.
u get my icon for 80

But mom I don't want to wear the ugly icon
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Don't you "mom" me. You want the nice treat? As long as you listen you'll get it.
LOL nice name.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
There are so many different Icons you can use, you don't have to use the cool Hunters Icon but you can if you want to.
I want to use a Poro icon. You realize that I spent 50k BE on this icon and Riot is forcing me not to use it?

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kkPkwKha,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-11-24T22:34:43.669+0000)
>
> I want to use a Poro icon. You realize that I spent 50k BE on this icon and Riot is forcing me not to use it?

I bought it too and want to show it off, but I appreciate the PROJECT Icons too and am fine with showing them off too. I'll just wear the Gemstone Knight icon afterwards. :)
There's skin shards dangling as incentive to not use it, that's basically the same as forcing me.

You can use other project icons at least.

Case in point: my account currently.
Omg the boards are the same, every comment has a project icon lol
Guys it doesn't necessarily have to be the new project icon, you can equip ANY other icon from the previous project events like project ashe, kat, ekko, yi, lucian etc.. and It'll still count.
Many people probably just don't own another Project icon.
Or we just didn't know, including myself.
It is still forcing people to use a project icon. I want to be able to chose any icon whenever I feel like it and still do the missions (like pretty much everyone wants to do).

Joke's on you, I have all three weapon icons, haha.

But srsly, this is one flaw they still didn't fix. Otherwise quite fine event. Relatively. Just wish they'd drop the icon thing.
They already said its going to be the last event with this requirement.
Hallelujah if that's true.
Yup, sucks. But hey, at least the rewards are totally not worth it as well. XD

uhm why not?
Got 2 skins for free.
Yup, 2 useless skins I didn't want. XD It doesn't matter, such is the nature of randomness. We can't all get lucky drops.
I already have all the ones I like {{sticker:cass-cry}}

Me too.{{sticker:cass-cry}} 
But got Ashe out of it, some sweet Orange Essence.

It's actually 48 tokens per orb (otherwise you would not be able to get 2 of them), and they are not guaranteed project skins, you just get a random skin.

Here, this is what's in them:
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-project-hunters-event

Not that guaranteed project skins would change anything for me, I don't like any of them. XD

> [{quoted}](name=Valderis Vandala,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kkPkwKha,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-24T21:07:54.038+0000)
>
> Yup, sucks. But hey, at least the rewards are totally not worth it as well. XD

How is two free skin boxes not worth it? I got a free skin out of this event and all I had to do was play league.
Free stuff is free stuff, even a Nottingham Ezreal is worth it (not that appealing tho)

I'm literally using a project icon for a champ I rarely play just so I don't have to be the same triangle everyone else is LOL

I'm pretty sure I got this thing out of a chest randomly ages ago
I AM NOT BENDING TO THE WILL OF RITO!
They did a great job with these missions.
Stop complaining about every little thing.

I'll have you know good sir that this is the Internet, complaining is our lifeblood.

Plus, like, this is LoL Boards, do you really expect anything other then cancer here? XD
Occasionally we have tuberculosis too
Nein

You can use other project icons at least.

Case in point: my account currently.
How new are you that none of your friends have any of the 6 project icons that were free in prior events?

Even outside of those I got the Zed one from a random chest like a year ago. There are A LOT of different icons running around and like 30 are eligible for this event unlike the Star Guardian one where only a select few and not that many from previous years.
